comments.author: João Lucas Barchik

captions.text:
“Improbable Deaths”.
Andy, Elidio and Edu will play.

I'll need you to give me
three objects.

'Nail polish’!
Another non-lethal object.
'Duster’! Great!

- Answering machine!
- ‘Answering machine’!

They will improvise a scene,
in any way they want,
but Edu will die by nail polish.
Andy will die by duster.

And for Elidio I carefully chose
a death by an answering machine.

It will be over when they are
dead by those objects you gave us.
It's the “Death Game”, go!

Bernardete, could you
come into my office?
Yes?

Here's the thing: I called a repairman
and he didn't fix the answering machine.

- But... - Bernardete, I leave you for
five minutes with the repairman,

he doesn't fix the machine
and you let him go?

I thought he fixed it, boss!
He tricked me!

I can take it to the
repair shop if you want...

Never mind, I'll fix this
machine by myself now...

- May I move the machine
for a second... - Sure.

- I'll leave it... - I insist
to take it to the repair shop.

- Just for dusting... - Turns out
I'm the boss! Isn't it crazy?

It's crazy, I'll fix the
answering machine by myself!

But you are... Well, I don't wanna
meddle, I meddle too much already...

- Easy, boss! - I got shocked!
What do you say!

Listen! Stop dusting the boss'
room, he has rhinitis!

I'll take this duster and
put it away from this room!
Fine! I'll take another one!

I'm glad we got the wrong shipment,
I asked for one and they gave us eleven!
We got eleven dusters!

- I'll go back to my lacework!
- No. We're doing this together.

- I disconnected the power plug so
you don't get shocked! - Of course!

- You don't have to worry!
- Thanks a lot!

By the way, do you have
a plastic bag I can borrow?

- I have a plastic bag.
- The one from the duster, can I have it?

- Here! I still have the duster.
- Thanks!
What is going on in my office?

I'm just sniffing nail polish
to bear the stress, boss!

You have the nerve to sniff
nail polish in my office?

Here, you can use mine,
it's very good too.

Wow, a ‘gabriella’,
amazing!

- Listen, I want both of you...
- Weren't you going to fix the machine?

- I was going to fix the machine...
- Then fix the fucking machine.

Listen, who do you
think you're talking to?
With my grandson!

You don't get to treat me like that just
because you gave me the job, hot shot.

I don't have authority
in my own company!
Boss, I think I'm feeling sick!

Of course, you were breathing
nail polish in my office!

- Give me that nail polish.
- No... Let me have it!

Here.
There's another one.

I ordered a nail polish. They
sent eleven! Can you believe it?
Those delivery girls...

I cant take this anymore!
I can't take it!

- I'll do something crazy!
- Boss!

- I decided to do something crazy!
- No, no...

- I did! I'll put the answering
machine here... - Oh, no...

Easy! What are you
thinking? Stay there!

Beacuse I'll jump from the
19th floor! That's what I'll do.

My God, the boss
is gonna kill himself!
I'm waiting!

- Don't forget that the machine is here!
- Of course!
Bye!

- Bye, grandson!
- I don't have the courage.

The answering machine
hit my head!

Boss!
How could you let it happen?

Boss! Look at this red puddle,
it looks like a ‘let me kiss’ polish!

They will accuse us!
And you're not doing anything!

Throw this duster away!
Do something!

That's the second one,
I got nine more!

I'm nervous! I'll have a beer
from his fridge to calm down!
This beer is not good!

Oh, my God! It's really strange!
I'm feeling...

It's from Poland...
a Polish ale!
To see my favorite employee fall.
To see my grandson die.

The pain is so strong.
So strong...

This kind of pain makes
my heart turn to dust.

And this duster
takes my life away!

He had nine dusters to stick wherever
he wanted, and he died from a pun!

This duster
takes my life away!

You have to be a poet
to talk like that!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROV¡VEL
Probably a good show.

It's running on the Pinheiros road
and there's a woman in there!
